ygData.subject: Re: newbie- im
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Alex  To:  Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 07:49 Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: newbie- im ... Make a
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Alex <leealex@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 07:49
Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: newbie- im


> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> 1) How do u increase your skill in "head sensing" ?
>
Make a hotkey to it. And use it everytime. It will increase. But there's
a skill cap at each lvl so don't worry much if u don't seems to increase at
a certain point



> 2) can a player from one server "transfer" the char to another?
>

No clue on this one. Any1 know can?

> thx
> Alex
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 10:58 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: newbie- im
>
>
> >From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> >
> > No worries, U can still go to zones the other way round. There
are
> >hidden paths.
